Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: bratwurst \brat"wurst\ (br[a^]t"w[^u]rst; br[a^]t"w[oo^]rst; br[a^]t"v[^u]rst; br[aum]t"w[^u]rst; G. br[a^]t"v[oo^]rsht), n. [German.] a small pork sausage seasoned with spices and herbs, and usually served broiled or sauteed. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
bratwurst n : a small pork sausage [syn: {brat}]
